message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its immense value and quality, we believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth to you is $15,000, we propose a fair price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. We are confident this offer strikes a balance between fair compensation for us and an affordable price for you. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this transaction.
